phase.name: Initiation of the project
phase.requirements: Individual or company to initiate the project
phase.functions:
To deliver:
Location of the house for renovation
Kadaster number of the house

phase.name: Documentation of current situation
phase.requirements:
Location of the house for Kadaster online platform
Possession of any drawings of existing situation from Kadaster
phase.functions:
To deliver:
Information regarding existence and format of drawings
CAD drawing of existing conditions

phase.name: Site Inspection Contractor
phase.requirements: Location of the house and permission for inspection of the roof structure
phase.functions:
To deliver:
Dimensions and state of existing roof structure

phase.name: Site Inspection Subcontractor
phase.requirements: Location of the house and permission for inspection of the roof structure
phase.functions:
To deliver:
Dimensions and state of existing roof structure

phase.name: Design for Permits
phase.requirements:
CAD drawing of the existing situation
Information from site inspection
phase.functions:
To deliver:
CAD drawing of new situation for application for permits

phase.name: Application for Permits
phase.requirements: CAD drawing of new situation for application for permits

phase.name: Detailed Design of new situation
phase.requirements:
CAD drawing of new situation from application for permits
Approved permit
Details about the site from inspection
phase.functions:
To deliver:
Detailed technical documentation of new situation and details for mounting
Bill of material
Site utilization for renovation

phase.name: Communication with the contractor/subcontractors
phase.functions:
To deliver information regarding:
Subcontractors responsible for transport and installation on site
To secure order of required material and tools for activities on site

phase.name: Logistics/Transport to site
phase.requirements: Date and time for delivery to site
phase.functions: To deliver material and equipment to site

phase.name: Vertical transport on site
phase.requirements:
Access to the front or side of the house
Delivery of equipment for vertical transport
Security of operators for working on height
phase.functions: To elevate and support workers and materials

phase.name: Horizontal transport on site
phase.requirements:
Dedicated area on site for operating
Delivery of equipment for horizontal transport
phase.functions: To handle and operate material on the ground

phase.name: Dismantling existing roof
phase.requirements:
Vertical transport of the operator to roof height and removing roof shingles
Horizontal transport of roof shingles to storage
phase.functions: To prepare roof for mounting of modules

phase.name: Mounting modules
phase.requirements:
Modules delivered to site
Vertical transport of the operator and modules
transport of modules
Placement and details for mounting

phase.name: Inspection
phase.requirements: Finished renovation of the roof and access to it from outside and/or inside
phase.functions: To inspect the system and give approval for the finished project

phase.name: Demolishing workshop
phase.requirements: Inspection finished and approval for dismantling the equipment

phase.name: Logistics/Transport FROM site
phase.requirements: Date and time for pickup from site
